# Website structure

This companion website to Ellestad *et al.* (in prep.) provides a [reproducible report](reproducible_report.html) associated to this research on the genomics of Mexican *Vanilla planifolia*.

This website is structured with the following tabs:

- [Reproducible report](reproducible_report.html): Presentation of the data, software and code associated to the genomic analyses conducted on the *Vanilla planifolia* samples.
- [GenomeScope review](heterozygosity_review.html): Code and analyses associated to review on heterozygosity in plants inferred using the approach implemented in GenomeScope (v. 1 and 2).
- [How to cite](): Preferred citations to refer to material presented here.
- [Acknolwedgements](funding.html): List of people and funders supporting this research.
